article_title: Another GOP Governor Says Yes To Medicaid Funds

article_metadata.author: Dan Diamond

og.description: VideoPennsylvania on Thursday became the 27th state — and the ninth state led by a Republican governor — to opt in to the Affordable Care Act's Medicaid expansion. Under Pennsylvania's waiver request, which was approved by CMS, the state will launch a five-year "Healthy Pennsylvania" demonstration project that will begin on Jan. [...]
